title: Secret
description: Settings that are not for public consumption. Do not get mad if these things change without notice.

children.title: Library Column Count
children.description: Number of columns in library view

children.title: Color Settings
children.description: Change the colors of elements in the app

children.title: Background
children.description: The base background color for all screens in Jellyfin.

children.title: Primary Text
children.description: The primary text color for all screens in Jellyfin.

children.title: Secondary Text
children.description: The secondary text color for all screens in Jellyfin.

children.title: Cursor
children.description: The highlight color for the cursor showing where the user's focus is.

children.title: What's New Author
children.description: The text color for the author in the What's New popup.

children.title: Watched Check Mark & Unplayed Count
children.description: Watched Check Mark & Unplayed Count color settings

children.title: Background
children.description: The background color of the check mark & unplayed count shown in the top right corner of items.

children.title: Watched Check Mark
children.description: The color of the watched check mark.

children.title: Unplayed Count
children.description: The text color of the unplayed count number.

title: Global
description: Global settings that affect everyone that uses this Roku device.

children.title: Remember Me?
children.description: Remember the currently logged in user and try to log them in again next time you start Jellyfin.

title: Playback
description: Settings relating to playback and supported codec and media types.

children.title: Autoplay Episode Limit
children.description: The number of episodes that will play automatically after the selected episode. Requires 'Play next episode automatically' server setting to be enabled.

children.title: Bitrate Limit
children.description: Configure the maximum playback bitrate.

children.title: Enable Limit
children.description: Enable or disable the 'Maximum Bitrate' setting.

children.title: Maximum Bitrate
children.description: Set the maximum bitrate in Mbps. Set to 0 to use Roku's specifications. This setting must be enabled to take effect.

children.title: Cinema Mode
children.description: Bring the theater experience straight to your living room with the ability to play custom intros before the main feature.

children.title: Compatibility
children.description: Attempt to prevent playback failures.

children.title: Disable HEVC
children.description: Disable the HEVC codec on this device. This may improve playback for some devices (ultra).

children.title: Custom Subtitles
children.description: Replace Roku's default subtitle functions with custom functions that support CJK fonts. Fallback fonts must be configured and enabled on the server for CJK rendering to work.

children.title: Custom Trickplay
children.description: Display custom trickplay images even if this Roku says it's displaying its own. This may cause the two images to overlay on top of each other.

children.title: Force Transcoding
children.description: Force all playable media to be transcoded.

children.title: Maximum Resolution
children.description: Configure the maximum resolution when playing video files on this device.

children.title: Mode
children.description: Apply max resolution to all files or only transcoded files.

children.title: Value
children.description: Set the maximum resolution when playing video files on this device.

options.title: Off - Attempt to play all resolutions

children.title: Media Segment Actions
children.description: Settings relating to how Jellyfin should handle media segments.

children.title: Commercial Segments
children.description: What action should Jellyfin take for commercial segments?

children.title: Intro Segments
children.description: What action should Jellyfin take for intro segments?

children.title: Outro Segments
children.description: What action should Jellyfin take for outro segments?

children.title: Preview Segments
children.description: What action should Jellyfin take for preview segments?

children.title: Recap Segments
children.description: What action should Jellyfin take for recap segments?

children.title: Next Episode Button Time
children.description: If no Outro media segment exists, set how many seconds before the end of an episode the Skip Outro button should appear. Set to 0 to disable.

children.title: Preferred Audio Codec
children.description: Use the selected audio codec for transcodes. If the device or stream does not support it, a fallback codec will be used.

children.title: Text Subtitles Only
children.description: Only display text subtitles to minimize transcoding.

children.title: Video Codec Support
children.description: Enable or disable Direct Play support for certain codecs.

children.title: MPEG-2
children.description: Support Direct Play of MPEG-2 content (e.g., Live TV). This will prevent transcoding of MPEG-2 content, but uses significantly more bandwidth.

children.title: MPEG-4
children.description: Support Direct Play of MPEG-4 content. This may need to be disabled for playback of DIVX encoded video files.

children.title: Video Profile Level Support
children.description: Attempt Direct Play of potentially unsupported profile levels

children.title: H.264
children.description: Attempt Direct Play for H.264 media with unsupported profile levels before falling back to transcoding if it fails.

children.title: HEVC
children.description: Attempt Direct Play for HEVC media with unsupported profile levels before falling back to transcoding if it fails.

title: User Interface
description: Settings relating to how the application looks.

children.title: General
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of the Home screen and the program in general.

children.title: Channel Background Image
children.description: Overlay a background image over the channel's background color

children.title: Episode Images Next Up
children.description: What type of images to use for Episodes shown in the 'Next Up' and 'Continue Watching' sections.

children.title: Use Fallback Font Across App
children.description: Changes the font used in the app to the server's configured fallback font.

children.title: Hide Clock
children.description: Hide all clocks in Jellyfin. Jellyfin will need to be closed and reopened for changes to take effect.

children.title: Max Days Next Up
children.description: Set the maximum amount of days a show should stay in the 'Next Up' list without watching it.

children.title: Rewatching Next Up
children.description: Show already watched episodes in 'Next Up' sections.

children.title: Show What's New Popup
children.description: Show What's New popup when Jellyfin is updated to a new version.

children.title: Use Web Client's Home Section Arrangement
children.description: Make the arrangement of the Roku home view sections match the web client's home screen. Jellyfin will need to be closed and reopened for change to take effect.

children.title: Item Detail Screen
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of the item detail screen.

children.title: Community and Critical Ratings
children.description: Community and critic review ratings from Rotten Tomatoes.

children.title: Overview Content
children.description: A quick overview of the item selected - typically a short plot outline.

children.title: Libraries
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of Library pages.

children.title: General
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of pages in all Libraries.

children.title: Forget Filters
children.description: Forget applied library filters when Jellyfin is closed.

children.title: Grid View Settings
children.description: Settings that apply when Grid views are enabled.

children.title: Item Count
children.description: Show item count in the library and index of selected item.

children.title: Item Titles
children.description: Select when to show titles.

children.title: TV Shows
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of pages in TV Libraries.

children.title: Disable Unwatched Episode Count
children.description: If enabled, the number of unwatched episodes in a series/season will be removed.

children.title: Skip Details for Single Seasons
children.description: If enabled, selecting a TV series with only one season will go straight to the episode list rather than the show details and season list.
